description: Get started with email marketing for your Holiday Let Business using Aweber, we cover the basics of what Aweber is and how you can use it inside your Holiday Let Business. We’ll also look at how to create an Aweber Account and how to section your subscribers according to different criteria. In another Free Course we look at how email marketing is the backbone of your business and the key to taking control of your Holiday Home Marketing and the future of your Holiday Let Business, it’s important that you take this course first.
title: Aweber for Holiday Let | Vacation Rental Owners
